parameters.name: Objects
parameters.description: Array of objects as defined in swSelectType_e to select (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SelMarks
parameters.description: Array of selection marks (integers or longs) for the objects (see Remarks )

title: IMacroFeatureData.SetSelections2
description: Sets the selected objects for the macro feature.
signature:
void SetSelections2( 
   System.Object
Objects
,
   System.Object
SelMarks
,
   System.Object
DrViews
)

parameters.name: Objects
parameters.description: Array of objects as defined in swSelectType_e to select (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SelMarks
parameters.description: Array of selection marks (integers or longs) for the objects (see Remarks )

remarks:
Early bind the Objects, SelMarks, and DrViews arrays when declaring them to avoid possible problems when using other IMacroFeatureData methods.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.

examples.title: Cut Body in Half Using Macro Feature (VBA)
